name: hotkeys-js
description: A simple micro-library for defining and dispatching keyboard shortcuts. It has no dependencies.

scripts.build:min: umd hotkeys src/hotkeys.js | uglifyjs -mc | bannerjs -o > dist/hotkeys.min.js
scripts.build:dist: umd hotkeys src/hotkeys.js | bannerjs -m | uglifyjs -b beautify=true --comments 'all' > dist/hotkeys.js
scripts.build: npm run build:min && npm run build:dist
